start: Search for lyrics directly from Telegram :D - For more info, use /help Let's start? Browse with the keyboard below:
help:
This bot show music lyrics according to your search, using musixmatch.com.

You can search using the inline mode (@lyricspyrobot <music>), or even see the music lyrics of the music playing right now on your Spotify using spoti (needs login) :D

The following commands are available:
    • /letra <music> (Search the provided music lyrics)

   • /spoti (show the music playing right now ~does not need premium~)

If you have any questions, contact us at @AmanoSupport or in our chat @AmanoChat.
- News and updates will be posted in the @AmanoTeam channel.
